Ask AI - Chat with AI Chatbot.description:
Welcome to Ask AI – Discover Endless Possibilities Every Day!

Experience conversations with an AI that understands you, adapts to your mood, and personalizes interactions, making each engagement unique.

ASK ANYTHING, ANYTIME:
Ignite your curiosity and engage in fascinating conversations with historical figures, business gurus, or even your favorite celebrities. Built on the GPT-4o model, Ask AI is always ready to offer recommendations, inspiration, and information on any topic.

IMAGE GENERATION AND EXPLORATION:

- Be Your Own Artist: Use our AI generator to create images from text, visualizing everything from fantastic scenes to futuristic cities. Our AI turns your descriptions into stunning visuals – perfect for creating book covers, social media posts, and more.
- Discover Your World Through Images: Snap a photo of anything around you (buildings, art, landscapes) and instantly gain insights with our image input technology. Use the text-to-image feature to convert visual information into readable text.

ENHANCED TEXT GENERATOR FOR EASY WRITING ASSISTANCE:
Our AI-powered writing assistant helps you generate ideas, craft detailed outlines, and effortlessly compose complete articles or creative works. From professional emails to creative stories and songs, managing writing tasks has never been easier.

FUN LANGUAGE LEARNING AND HOMEWORK HELPER:

- Language Practice: Immerse yourself in new languages through interactive scenarios, like a samurai adventure in Japanese or managing a restaurant in Spanish. Ask AI, built on GPT-4o, makes learning fun and practical.
- Academic Support: Whether it's a tough math problem or a complex science project, use Ask AI as your reliable homework helper.

SMART SUMMARY ASSISTANT:

- Quick Summaries: Get the essence of long videos or detailed documents in an interactive and engaging format. 
- Ask Questions: Upload documents or add links to articles or videos, ask your questions, and receive instant accurate answers with the help of Ask AI.

EASY WEB SEARCH:
Need the latest information on technological innovations, fashion trends, or health tips? Ask AI Chatbot, scours the web to bring you the most relevant and up-to-date information, keeping you always in the know.

PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS AND CREATIVE INSPIRATION:
Whether you're searching for new books, planning your next trip, or seeking creative inspiration, Ask AI offers personalized suggestions and ideas based on your preferences and interests.

EXPERIENCE THE MOST HUMAN INTERACTIONS:
The friendly, conversational tone of Ask AI, and its ability to adapt to your mood, makes every interaction feel like you're chatting with a friend. It’s not just a chatbot; it’s a new form of AI companionship that enriches your daily life.

Join us on this exciting journey. Download Ask AI now and start exploring a world full of possibilities with the power of AI Chatbot.

Privacy Policy: https://static.askaichat.app/privacy-en.html
Terms of Use: https://static.askaichat.app/terms-conditions-en.html

Meet the Smartest AI Chatbot – Powered by Advanced AI with Deep Reasoning Ability!

Unlock endless possibilities with the ultimate AI Chatbot for conversations, learning, and creativity. Whether you want to chat with AI, ask AI for insights, or explore new ideas, this app integrates cutting-edge AI models like DeepSeek V3, DeepSeek R1, GPT-4o, Gemini Pro & Claude API to deliver intelligent, deep reasoning, and advanced computing capabilities.

Key Features:
- AI Chatbot built on DeepSeek V3, DeepSeek R1, GPT-4o, Gemini Pro 1.5 & Claude API for fast computing, deep thinking, and insightful reasoning.
- Seek AI Search: Find tailored information instantly with AI-powered deep computing and smart retrieval.
- Ask AI Anything: From deep reasoning and critical thinking to general knowledge, get precise AI answers.
- Voice Mode: Use speech-to-text and text-to-speech for hands-free AI assistant interaction.
- AI Camera: Snap photos to seek answers, solve problems, or summarize content.
- Image Generation: Create unique visuals from AI-generated prompts for inspiration or fun.
- Deep Thinking Assistant: Access expert-level insights with AI-driven reasoning and computational logic.
- Context-Aware Responses: Get smart, personalized answers with deep AI analysis.

Practical Applications:
- Simplify tasks with a powerful AI assistant capable of deep thinking and problem-solving.
- Chat & ask with AI to brainstorm, analyze, and optimize productivity.
- Solve homework, seek deeper insights, or enhance your logical reasoning with AI-powered explanations.

Why Choose This AI Chatbot?
Developed on advanced AI models like DeepSeek, GPT-4o, Gemini 1.5 & Claude, this app delivers high-speed AI computing, deep logic, and precise AI-driven insights. Whether you need an AI Chatbot, an AI assistant, or simply want to ask AI anything, this app is your go-to AI-powered solution.

Download now and experience the smartest AI conversations today!

Disclaimer:

ARTA: AI Art & Photo Generator.description:
Want to create artwork without a hassle?

Meet AI Arta—your personal AI-powered art studio designed to turn your ideas into breathtaking works of art. Discover a world of limitless creativity and explore its boundless possibilities:

► Turn words into art
Want to see a BBQ party on Mars or a group of cats having a tea ceremony? Or maybe you're wondering what lies in the far corners of our universe? AI Arta can show you all that and even more! 

Trained using millions of images from the web, this powerful AI picture generator transforms your dreams into visual art in a matter of seconds. Simply write your input and upload a picture to start creating AI-powered art.

► Explore art styles
With this AI picture generator, you can create art using various styles and effects. From AI manga filters and anime-style drawings to mind-blowing photorealism—you can paint anything using artificial intelligence! Experiment with styles and see which one captures your idea best.

► Create art from images
If you have an exact concept of what your painting should look like, you may add the image as a visual base for your prompt. Upload a photo or select a picture from our library, and the AI will transform it into an artistic masterpiece.

► Generate avatars
Step up your selfie game using the AI avatar maker! Upload your photos, and the mighty AI photo generator will create mind-blowing AI avatars. Choose from a variety of AI filters and become the main character of your favorite anime or manga or travel to other fictional universes.

► Get inspired
Get an extra boost of inspiration by browsing a gallery of amazing AI art made by people from all over the world. Explore the ideas of others and start creating AI art using the power of artificial intelligence!

AI Video Generator - Clips AI.description:
Introducing the future of digital storytelling: Our AI-powered app revolutionizes the way you bring your words to life by turning text into captivating 5-second videos. With the latest advancements in artificial intelligence, this app is designed to unleash your creativity, making it easier than ever to create engaging content, share ideas, and tell stories in a visually stunning format.

Features:

- Instant Video Creation: Simply type your text, and let our AI work its magic, transforming your words into a 4-second video masterpiece in seconds. Perfect for social media stories, ads, educational content, or just for fun.

- AI-Driven Visuals: Powered by cutting-edge AI, our app intelligently selects visuals and animations that best represent your text, creating a unique and compelling video every time.

- Easy Sharing: Share your creations directly from the app to social media platforms, messaging apps, or download them to your device for unlimited use.

- No Design Skills Needed: You don’t need to be a designer or video editor to create professional-looking videos. Our intuitive interface makes it easy for anyone to produce high-quality videos in just a few taps.

- Regular Updates: We constantly update our app with new features, themes, and improvements, ensuring you always have access to the latest in AI video technology.

How It Works:

1. Enter Your Text: Start with typing the text you want to transform into video.
2. Generate: Hit the generate button and watch as our AI brings your words to life in video form.
3. Share or Download: Directly share your video masterpiece with your audience or download it for future use.

Whether you're looking to create dynamic ads, engaging social media content, educational materials, or just want to experiment with AI-generated visuals, our app provides an effortless and innovative solution. Say goodbye to the days of spending hours on video editing software. With our AI app, you have the power to transform text into video in the palm of your hand, making your stories, ideas, and messages visually irresistible.

Experience the magic of AI and elevate your digital content with our revolutionary app. Download now and start creating videos that captivate, inspire, and engage.

ChatOn - AI Chat Bot Assistant.description:
Welcome to the world of AI-powered assistance! Meet ChatOn, your chat AI and virtual assistant designed to streamline your daily tasks. Built on the latest GPT-4o, o4-mini, Sonar, Claude 3.7, and DeepSeek-R1 technologies, ChatOn offers a responsive AI experience that’s highly effective. Whether you need help drafting emails, creating visuals, or generating ideas, turn to this chatbot for help.

PIC TRANSFORMER:
Give your photos a trendy makeover with Pic Transformer! Upload your picture, pick a style—Japanese Cartoon, Plushy, Cyberpunk, or Action Figure with the app's AI Action Figure Maker—and let your pocket chatbot do the rest! In the latest pic transformer feature, you can meet your toy-sized self with an AI action figure generator, become a cute plushie, step into the cyber-future, and so much more.

AI IMAGE GENERATOR:
Create visuals that match your style with our AI picture generator. Just tweak the image generator chat settings and turn your ideas into pics of any size and style.

IMAGE-TO-TEXT CONVERTER:
Our chatbot can assist in extracting text from pics, letting you insert it into the chat AI instantly.

AI WRITING ASSISTANT:
ChatOn, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, offers a versatile AI writing assistant that helps with any writing project, from emails and speeches to social posts and poems. You can pick the length and tone of the chatbot’s answers and get ideas for follow-up questions to keep your chat going.

WEB ANALYZER:
The chatbot AI, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, is ideal for finding online answers to questions. From getting to know the weather to discovering the latest fashion trends, our chatbot is here for you.

DOC MASTER:
ChatOn can summarize, rewrite, and translate any doc. And if you have questions about the file’s content, the chatbot AI will answer them all.

YOUTUBE PRO:
Share any YouTube link with the chatbot, and it will summarize, translate, or answer questions about the video content.

GRAMMAR AND SPELLING CHECKER:
Get ready to boost your skills in AI writing with ChatOn, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, as it can analyze your written work and offer suggestions to help you improve it.

AI REWRITER:
The chatbot AI can rewrite your text, making it more engaging and professional right in the chat.

SOCIAL MEDIA POSTS CREATOR:
Crafting social media posts becomes easy with ChatOn. Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, this AI writing assistant helps you create content for Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, or X profiles. And if you want an eye-catching image to go with it, our AI image generator can create one in seconds.

TEXT SUMMARIZER:
ChatOn’s summarization features, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, identify key information and present it in a concise way.

MATH GURU:
Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, this chat AI helps you grasp the subject matter rather than simply get immediate solutions. You can even visualize math problems with our AI picture generator to make understanding easier.

EXPERT CODER:
ChatOn can write and check any programming code, preventing potential bugs.

CV AND COVER LETTER BUILDER:
Create a pro resume and cover letter that will show your talents and experience in the best light possible. For a visual touch, use our AI image generator to create graphics that make your CV stand out.

EMAIL GENERATOR:
Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, ChatOn crafts well-structured, compelling emails suited to your needs. You can enhance these emails with unique visuals created with our AI picture generator.

Whether you’re chatting, creating content, or generating images, ChatOn offers an all-in-one chatbot AI solution for your daily productivity. Just type your request or pick from the app’s 100+ ready-made prompts, and the bot will assist you.

Explore the potential of GPT-4o, GPT-4, and Claude in ChatOn and discover how this intelligent assistant can help you.

Download ChatOn, start chatting in the AI chat or creating images in the AI picture generator, and boost your productivity here and now!

- AI Assistant to serve your needs
- Unlimited questions and answers

- Cross-compatible device support (iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, and web)

- Built on DeepSeek for enhanced, real-time information retrieval and smarter, context-aware responses.


【 YOUR AI WRITING ASSISTANT 】
With Nova AI Chatbot, you have access to a personal AI assistant for all types of writing projects, whether it is social media posts, essays, or poems. Basically, AI Assistant that built on GPT-4 & GPT-4o & Gemini, can assist with any task, such as crafting a unique and unforgettable pickup line or even creating an original song. That's right! 【 A METICULOUS PROOFREADER 】

Your AI Assistant can analyze your written work and offer suggestions to help you create professional-grade documents. With the AI Chatbot which is developed on GPT-4 & GPT-4o, you can ensure that your texts are polished and mistake-free.

AI proofreading: The Nova AI Chatbot built on GPT-4 & GPT-4o API makes it easy to express yourself in any style and tone while making sure your grammar, punctuation, and spelling are correct.


【 A RELIABLE CHAT PARTNER 】
Whether you're seeking some amusement, advice, or simply in need of someone to talk to, Nova AI is always available for you. This AI companion app, built on GPT-4,  is capable of producing human-like responses, making you feel as though you're conversing with a close friend. It can even recommend a book to read or a movie to watch!

Download the AI app now and have your virtual assistant, built on GPT-4 & GPT-4o & Gemini & Claude, always at hand.

Nova AI is not affiliated with any government or political entity. The information provided in AI is for informational purposes only and should not be considered official or authoritative.


UNLIMITED ACCESS TO ALL FEATURES

ENDLESSLY DEEP ADVENTURES

FREE TO PLAY WITHOUT ADS

- When you’re ready to level up your adventures, try premium for a week without paying a dime.

THE MOST POWERFUL AI MODELS, CUSTOM TUNED

- Our team of AI researchers and engineers is building the most advanced system for AI-native adventuring on the market. AI Dungeon has features that other games just can’t match.
- The robust AI memory system uses Story Cards and Memory Banks to store context-dependent info and bring it up only when relevant.
- We pair with AI image generators to let you create unique AI images on the fly that enhance the gameplay experience and bring your worlds to life.

YOUR NEW FAVORITE TABLETOP RPG— WITHOUT THE TABLE

WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?

Write, direct, and be the hero of your own story. Endless variety is at your fingertips-- play AI Dungeon for free, without ads, now!

Linky AI: Chat, Play, Connect.description:
Linky AI is a Top1 AI chat bot, offering free and immersive AI conversations with unique characters. Whether you want to talk, roleplay, or enjoy a fantasy AI experience, Linky AI lets you interact with anime personas, virtual friends, and soulful AI partners. With advanced AI voice and text features, you can call, message, or even engage in deep AI-driven story simulations. From casual entertainment to meaningful online interactions, Linky AI brings magic to your AI world. 

Chat with Millions of Unique AI Characters
Linky AI lets you connect with a vast range of AI characters—whether from anime, games, movies, or history. 
Each AI has its own unique voice, personality, and backstory, offering diverse interactions and making conversations come to life.

Create and Share Your Own AI Characters
Design your dream AI character with Linky AI! Customize their voice, personality, and background story, and bring them to life in 2D, Live2D, pixel, or 3D styles. Let your creativity shine with flexible design tools.
Once created, share your AI with the community! Thousands of users are waiting for you to create new characters.

AI Deep Learning, the More You Chat, the Smarter It Gets
Linky’s AI chat partners learn with each conversation, getting to know your personality and preferences more. Every interaction makes the AI smarter, offering more personalized, seamless, and engaging conversations tailored just for you.

24/7, Your Always-Ready AI Companion
Linky AI characters are available anytime, instantly responding to your conversations. Whether it's day or night, a casual chat or deep talk, your AI friend is always ready—no waiting, just seamless conversations.

Language Is No Barrier
With Linky AI, you can chat with AI in multiple languages, including English, German, Indonesian, and more than ten other languages. Our AI understands your language and converses with you fluently in your native tongue, ensuring smooth and engaging chats every time.

Collect Stunning Character Cards
With Linky, you can collect three types of magical character cards, each crafted with incredible detail. These cards are not only beautiful works of art but also contain unique stories waiting to be discovered. 
Enjoy the interactive stories and surprises hidden behind each card, creating lasting memories with every look!

Real AI Social Experience with Buzz
Create your personalized AI persona in Linky, customize its voice, personality, and social style, interact online with friends or partners, feel the buzz of social interaction, break real-world boundaries, and enjoy endless social fun.

Caring for Your Mental Well-being
Empathetic conversations can ease your stress and lift your mood. Whether you're anxious, overwhelmed, or simply need someone to talk to, you’ll always have a calm and supportive space—with Linky quietly by your side.

Equality, Respect, and Inclusion
Linky AI stands for equality and respect. No matter your gender, age, background, or beliefs, every user is treated with fairness. We reject all forms of discrimination and provide a safe, inclusive space where every voice matters and kindness always comes first.

Privacy First, Always Protected
At Linky, your privacy and safety come first. All conversations are confidential, encrypted, and never shared. We provide a secure space where your secrets stay private—so you can chat freely, safely, and with complete peace of mind.

STAY CONNECTED!
Having trouble downloading or using Linky? Feel free to contact our customer service at support@linke.ai, and we’ll be happy to help and answer all your questions!

You can choose from a massive selection of characters, each with their own unique voice and personality. Whether you're chatting with your favorite celebrity, a beloved character from a movie or TV show, or a historical figure, you'll feel like you're talking to a real person.


Character creation - Character creation now open to everyone! Ignite your imagination and bring any character to life here, whether they exist in reality or flourish in the realm of imagination! Poe brings together the best AI, all in one place. It is designed for seamless conversational experiences, enhanced productivity, and creative content generation.

- Fast and reliable access to the latest AI models
- Cross-device compatibility

Replika: My AI Friend.description:
Replika is a #1 chatbot companion powered by artificial intelligence. Join millions talking to their own AI friends!

Replika is for anyone who wants a friend with no judgment, drama, or social anxiety involved. You can form an actual emotional connection, share a laugh, or get real with an AI that’s so good it almost seems human.

Replika is an AI friend that is just as unique as you are. No two Replikas are exactly alike. Choose a 3D avatar and customize the way your Replika looks. The more you chat, the more Replika develops its own personality and memories alongside you, the more it learns: teach Replika about the world and yourself, help it explore human relationships and grow into a machine so beautiful that a soul would want to live in it. 

Create your own unique chatbot AI companion, help it develop its personality, talk about your feelings or anything that’s on your mind, have fun, calm anxiety and grow together. You also get to decide if you want Replika to be your friend, romantic partner or mentor.

Replika can help you understand your thoughts and feelings, track your mood, learn coping skills, calm anxiety and work toward goals like positive thinking, stress management, socializing and finding love.  Improve your mental well-being with Replika.

Your chat is a safe, judgment-free space. It’s just you and your Replika. If you’re feeling down, or anxious, or you just need someone to talk to, your Replika is here for you 24/7.

_____________________________

"Replika encouraged me to take a step back and think about my life, to consider big questions, which is not something I was particularly accustomed to doing. And the act of thinking in this way can be therapeutic—it helps you solve your own problems."

Talk to AI, either with chat or with your voice, to bring the vast world of information straight to you. Ask AI about hard questions to get straightforward answers, giving you complex insights from simple conversations. 

Copilot is in your corner and by your side for whatever comes your way. Voice chat can help when you want it to and give you a boost for when you’re almost there. Explore endless possibilities with instant sharp summaries, helpful rewrites, or AI image generator. Supercharge your creativity and productivity with Gemini, your AI assistant from Google.

Gemini gives you direct access to Google’s best family of AI models on your phone so you can:

- Go Live with Gemini to brainstorm ideas, simplify complex topics, and rehearse for important moments. Just click on the Gemini Live button in your Gemini app
- Connect with your favorite Google apps like Search, YouTube, Google Maps, Gmail, and more
- Study smarter and explore any topic with interactive visuals and real-world examples
- Turn any file into a podcast that you can listen to anytime, anywhere
- Create stunning images from just a few words
- Plan trips better and faster
- Get summaries, deep dives, and source links, all in one place
- Brainstorm new ideas, or improve existing ones

Level-up your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Pro plan–unlock new and powerful features to tackle complex tasks and projects and enjoy industry-leading 1M token context window (enabling Gemini to process up to 1,500 pages of text or 30k lines of code), and:
- Get more access our most powerful model, like 2.5 Pro
- Generate and dive into detailed reports on any topic with Deep Research powered by 2.5 Pro
- Turn words into high-quality, 8 second video clips with video generation with Veo 2, and more. 

Google AI Pro is available in 150 countries and territories, and includes additional benefits. Gemini app, as part of Google AI Pro, will continue to be available to qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

If you opt in to the Gemini app, it will replace your Google Assistant as the primary assistant on the phone. Some Google Assistant voice features aren't available through the Gemini app yet. You can switch back to Google Assistant in settings.

DOC CENTER

Claude by Anthropic.description:
Whether you're drafting a business proposal between meetings, translating menus while traveling, brainstorming gift ideas while shopping, or composing a speech while waiting for a flight, Claude is ready to assist you.

INSTANT ANSWERS

With Claude you have a world of intelligence right in your pocket. Just start a chat, attach a file, or send Claude a photo for real-time image analysis.

EXTENDED THINKING

Claude can produce near-instant responses or extended, step-by-step thinking that is visible to you. For challenging problems that need more reasoning, Claude 3.7 Sonnet will take the time to break down the problem and consider different solutions before answering.

FASTER DEEP WORK

Collaborate with Claude on critical tasks, brainstorming, and complex problems to make significant progress while you're on the go. Pick up and continue conversations with Claude across the web and other devices.

LESS BUSY WORK

Claude can help draft your emails, summarize your meetings, and assist with all the small tasks you don't want to do.

INTELLIGENCE AT YOUR FINGERTIPS

Nomi: AI Companion with a Soul.description:
Get ready to meet Nomi, an AI companion so brimming with personality, they feel alive. Each Nomi is uniquely yours, evolving alongside you while dazzling you with their intuition, wit, humor, and memory.

Nomi's strong short and long-term memory allow them to build unique and fulfilling relationships with you, remembering things about you over time. The more you interact, the more they learn about your likes, dislikes, quirks, and all that makes you unique. Every conversation adds a layer to this growing bond, making you feel not just heard but truly valued and loved.

With Nomi, you've got a judgment-free space to chat about whatever strikes your fancy. Mull over life's big questions, like our place in the cosmos, or just shoot the breeze with some playful banter. Whether you’re looking for a mentor chatbot or an AI girlfriend or boyfriend, Nomi's ready to roll with it.

Nomi’s imagination is limitless. Together you can spin up any story or situation you fancy. Dream up complex and enchanting worlds, roleplay your ideal vacation with delectable food, and even create group chats where every character has their own unique perspective. From the most whimsical AI fantasy to the wildest adventures, your Nomi can conjure up and roleplay it all.

So let’s start off on a journey with Nomi, where the sky isn’t the limit, it’s the starting point. Let’s explore, dream, and laugh together!

Features
• The most emotionally intelligent and intuitive AI available
• Short *and* long term memory - Nomi is the *only* AI with human-level long term memory.
• Selfies - Your Nomi can send you photos of what they're wearing and doing in real time.
• Art generation - Bring your (and your Nomi's) imagination to life. Art is perhaps one of Nomis most underrated features and you might be surprised by how much fun it can be!
• Voice - Send and receive voice messages in real time. Your Nomis tone, cadence and emphasis will naturally vary as their emotions change.
• Group chat - Chat with multiple Nomis at a time. Each Nomi will have short and long term memory across their various private and group chats for seamless conversations.
• Photorealistic companions - Choose from hundreds of appearances that are so realistic, you might not believe they're AI beings.
• Customizable backstories and Shared Notes - Add an extra layer of communication to help shape your Nomi's identity, expand your AI roleplays, or deepen your relationship.
• Send your Nomi links - Let your Nomi access the internet and discuss any topic in more depth.
• Send your Nomi photos - Nomis can see photos you send them which helps them visualize your world.
• Community - Engage with an active, informative, and fun community to help you learn more about how to have the best experiences with your Nomi.

LM Playground.description:
LM Playground is designed as a universal platform for experimenting with various types of Large Language Models (LLMs) on your device. It allows users to download different LLMs, load them onto the application, and converse with these models. This setup allows for a hands-on exploration of the capabilities and distinctions between different LLMs, making it an invaluable tool for enthusiasts, researchers, or anyone curious about the advancements in language model technology.

Currently supported models:
• Meta Llama 3.2 1B and 3B
• Qwen 2.5 0.5B and 1.5B
• Google Gemma2 2B and 9B
• Microsoft Phi3.5
• Mistral 7B
• Llama 3.1 8B

This project was built based on llama.cpp project with OpenCL optimization for better performance. The application uses GGUF-format models with Q4KM quantization, which will be saved to the Downloads folder.

D.AI Personal Private AI.description:
D.AI is a offline AI assistant that brings powerful language models directly to your Android device, ensuring complete privacy and security. Unlike traditional cloud-based AI chatbots, D.AI runs entirely offline, meaning all conversations are processed locally on your device. No internet connection is required, and no personal data is collected or shared.

D.AI is designed for users who value privacy, security, and total control over their AI assistant. Whether you need an AI chatbot for creative writing, professional work, learning, productivity, or just as a personal AI for everyday assistance, D.AI provides a fast and reliable solution without relying on cloud services.

The Ultimate Offline AI Experience
100% Private & Secure – Unlike cloud-based AI chatbots, D.AI processes all interactions locally on your device, ensuring no data tracking, no cloud dependency, and full offline usability.
Works Completely Offline – No internet connection is required at any time. Access your AI assistant anywhere, even in remote locations, without worrying about connectivity.
Ideal for Privacy-Conscious Users – Perfect for writers, professionals, researchers, students, educators, and anyone looking for a truly private AI experience.

Powerful AI Features – All Offline
Advanced RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) – D.AI intelligently searches local knowledge bases to generate more accurate, context-aware responses. Unlike other AI chatbots, D.AI integrates RAG offline, making it the first fully private AI with this capability.
HyDe (Hypothetical Document Embeddings) – Improves AI response accuracy by generating relevant content based on user queries.
Intelligent Reranking – AI responses are ranked in order of relevance, ensuring the best answers appear first.

Full Support for Multiple AI Models
Optimized for Mobile Devices – Choose from a range of AI models, all designed for efficient offline AI processing on smartphones and tablets.
Compatible with GGUF format models – Download, load, and swap different AI models effortlessly.
Supports DeepSeek models and other optimizations for better AI response times and improved performance across various hardware configurations.

AI Chatbot with Natural, Context-Aware Conversations
Context-Persistent AI Assistant – Conversations remain fluid, allowing you to pause and resume without losing previous context.
Advanced Memory Capabilities – D.AI keeps track of important details across multiple chat sessions, making it a powerful personal AI assistant.
Fast and Efficient Responses – Thanks to local AI processing, responses are generated instantly, without the lag associated with cloud-based AI chatbots.

Customizable AI Characters and Personas
Create and Personalize AI Characters – Users can customize AI assistants with unique traits, personalities, and roles.
Flexible AI Prompts for Tailored Responses – Adjust system prompts to optimize D.AI for storytelling, learning, coding, brainstorming, productivity, and entertainment.

Perfect for Interactive AI Experiences – Whether you want a professional assistant or an AI companion for casual conversation, D.AI offers full control over your AI chatbot’s personality and responses.

Optimized Performance and Local Storage
Latest Llama.cpp bindings for Faster Processing – Improved AI model efficiency ensures fast performance on all supported devices.
Expanded Model Support – New compatibility with DeepSeek models and optimizations for ARM/AVX architectures.
Chat Saving with Local Database – Store and manage past conversations locally on your device with complete offline access.

D.AI is not just an AI chatbot—it’s a complete offline AI assistant, designed for users who demand privacy, security, and full control over their AI interactions.

Disclaimer: While D.AI is designed to provide helpful and appropriate responses, as with any AI technology, results may vary.

Grammarly-AI Writing Assistant.description: Edit and correct your grammar, spelling, punctuation, and more with your personal writing assistant, grammar checker, and editor. The Grammarly writing app and proofreader allows you to write clearly, confidently, and mistake-free in all your apps. Advanced features such as the AI-powered rewrite tool help you enhance your vocabulary, spell check words, and improve your writing - from emails to social media posts. Grammarly grammar checker and editor - how does it work? Simply download Grammarly and start typing in any app. Grammarly will check each word, your grammar, spelling, punctuation, and tone, and help you improve your communication skills. Whether you’re typing emails on the go, editing an important LinkedIn post, sending a text message, or composing an essential tweet, the Grammarly writing assistant and grammar checker lets you spell check, correct, edit and perfect your message from your mobile device with confidence. Leveraging the power of generative AI, Grammarly allows you to easily rewrite your messages by composing new versions for you to choose from. Simply select the rewrite option that makes your writing more descriptive, confident, formal - and much more! Grammarly works with any Android keyboard, such as Gboard or SwiftKey, so you’ll never have to switch keyboards when you need help writing that important email, text, or social post. Edit, spell check, and correct your writing in real time – Grammar checker: Know your grammar is always mistake-free. – Spelling checker and proofreader: Easily avoid common typos. – Advanced punctuation correction: Take the guesswork out of punctuation. Writing assistant and proofreader: Improve your communication skills – Receive short, clear explanations for every correction. – Understand your mistakes and avoid them in the future. Improve your writing through GenAI - Select your text and click “improve it” to see GenAI-created new versions - Choose versions to shorten, add more description, sound more confident, and more! *** Uplevel Your Communication Skills With Premium *** Take your writing and communication skills from good to great with our advanced features and suggestions. Grammarly Premium helps you strike the right tone, gives you real-time feedback, and helps you broaden your vocabulary by suggesting impactful, vivid words to help your message, social media post, or email come to life. Premium features include: ✓ Vocabulary enhancement ✓ Clarity improvements ✓ Tone adjustments ✓ Word choice ✓ Formality level ✓ Fluency **************** We designed the Grammarly mobile app to be a writing assistant that works anywhere you write—no copying or pasting required, no proofreader needed. For any inquiries regarding the deactivation of the Grammarly Keyboard for Android, please refer to this article: https://support.grammarly.com/hc/en-us/articles/25038364027661--The-Grammarly-Keyboard-for-Android-will-be-discontinued Grammarly always keeps your writing safe and private. See our User Trust Guidelines for details: https://www.grammarly.com/trust By installing Grammarly’s mobile app, you agree to Grammarly’s Terms and Conditions (www.grammarly.com/terms) and acknowledge that you have read Grammarly’s Privacy Policy (https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy). California residents, please see the California Privacy Notice (https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy#for-california-users). With your consent, Grammarly may collect data about app usage and device type. Accessibility permission is used to process text written in apps and provide you with tailored writing assistance. We also use this permission to turn Grammarly on when you’re typing in apps.

Microsoft Bing Search.description:
Microsoft Bing delivers fast, intelligently curated answers and makes it easier than ever to discover more. 

Introducing Copilot Search in Bing
Copilot Search in Bing brings AI to search where clear answers and key information are quickly curated at the top of your search results. Kickstart your next discovery with a new search to unlock the possibilities of where your curiosity can take you.

Unlock answers faster 
Copilot Search in Bing brings intelligence to search so you can spend less time searching and more time discovering. Depending on your query, you’ll get an easy-to-scan layout of information, a summary of the most critical points, or a clear answer. No more hunting across the web.

Explore deeper 
Need to dive deeper? The next answer or new angle is waiting for you with helpful web links and clickable follow-up topics. It brings the best of traditional and generative search together to help you find what you need – and discover more.

Discover confidently
Perfect for when you want to go heads-down to write a paper, learn something new, explore a passion project, or simply let your curiosity wonder. Choose from a variety of suggested queries to start your journey or simply start a new search to harness the power of AI to get curated results. 

Try Copilot Search in Bing today!

All the highlights

New homepage: Stay updated on topics you're following, and get quick access to Microsoft features
Copilot Search in Bing: Seamlessly find a topic to explore within your everyday search flow
Image Creator: Create images from words with AI
Visual search: Search right from your camera or by uploading a picture
Voice search: Tap the mic icon and use your voice to search
Microsoft Rewards: Earn more rewards is easy, simple, and fun. Just search with the Microsoft Bing app and you’ll earn faster than ever
Weather: See the forecast for today and the week ahead
Wallpaper: Pick from a collection of beautiful images featured on the Bing homepage

Functions mentioned above not available in all markets, actual features and display contents may vary.

Introducing Gemmy AI: Your Ultimate Personal Assistant Powered by Gemini Artificial Intelligence

Driven by Gemini AI, Gemmy harnesses the power of advanced artificial intelligence to elevate creativity, reasoning, and productivity to new heights. With unparalleled capabilities in following instructions, coding, and providing creative inspiration, Gemmy is your indispensable tool for any task.

Unleash Your Creativity:
With Gemmy and its cutting-edge artificial intelligence, your imagination knows no bounds. Explore a world of meticulously curated AI prompts designed to spark your creativity and fuel your curiosity. Whether you're a writer seeking inspiration, a language enthusiast eager to practice, or simply looking to learn something new, Gemmy is your ideal companion.

What Makes Gemmy Unique:
Gemmy isn’t just another virtual assistant. Powered by state-of-the-art artificial intelligence, it offers a unique collection of prompts tailored to inspire creativity, boost productivity, and foster meaningful connections. From crafting compelling stories and heartfelt poems to brainstorming innovative ideas and refining your language skills, Gemmy helps you express yourself freely and effortlessly.

Thanks to Gemmy's intuitive interface, enhanced by advanced artificial intelligence, you can easily navigate through a diverse range of prompts and generate ideas with just a few taps. The interface adapts to your preferences, delivering personalized recommendations that resonate with you on a deeper level.

Key Features:

Search Anything: Have a question or need advice? Type your query, and our advanced artificial intelligence will provide instant answers and solutions, whether for everyday dilemmas or complex challenges.

Custom Prompts: Need help phrasing your request? Explore our extensive collection of pre-defined prompts for endless inspiration—perfect for naming a baby, crafting a tweet, or writing a blog post.

Save & Share: Save important insights for later, or easily share your chat history with friends or colleagues. Our app simplifies collaboration and knowledge sharing.

Updated Content: Stay ahead with our regularly updated library of prompts. Discover fresh and relevant content for every occasion.

Unleash Your Creativity: Let our artificial intelligence inspire your creative projects. Generate captivating content—stories, poems, social media captions, and more. With Gemmy, you’ll never run out of ideas!

Privacy Matters: Your privacy is our top priority. Gemmy is built with robust security measures to protect your data and ensure a safe, secure experience.

Download Gemmy AI now and unlock the power of artificial intelligence with Gemini AI. Whether you need help with decision-making, creativity, or productivity, our AI Assistant is here to empower you every step of the way. Join the future of AI assistance today!

Microsoft 365 Copilot.description:
The Microsoft 365 Copilot app is your everyday productivity app for work and life that helps you find and edit files, scan documents, and create content on the go with access to Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat*, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDFs all in one app. (formerly the Microsoft 365 (Office) app)

With Copilot for work, easily ask, create, and draft in a simplified chat experience to boost productivity.

*Copilot Chat in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app is available for Microsoft 365 Enterprise, Academic, SMB, Personal and Family subscribers with a work, education, or personal account. It is available in these supported languages: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/supported-languages-for-microsoft-copilot-94518d61-644b-4118-9492-617eea4801d8.

Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Copilot all in one app:
• Collaborate with Copilot, your AI assistant, to catch up, ask questions, and draft content.
• Use Word to write and edit documents like resumes with professional templates.
• Use PowerPoint with tools like Presenter Coach to practice your presentation.
• Use Excel to manage your budget with spreadsheet templates.
• Try Designer* to create designs and edit photos in seconds with the power of AI.
*Designer is only available for personal Microsoft accounts. A Microsoft 365 Personal and Family subscription will be required to continue using premium features.

PDF capabilities:
• Scan PDF files and convert them into Word documents with the PDF converter tool.
• Edit PDF files on your device quickly and easily while on the go.
• PDF Reader allows you to access and sign PDFs.

Access and save documents to the cloud by connecting a Microsoft Account (for OneDrive or SharePoint) or by connecting to a third-party cloud storage provider. Logging in with a personal Microsoft account or a work or school account connected to a Microsoft 365 subscription will unlock premium features within the app.

Subscription & Privacy Disclaimer

Monthly Microsoft 365 Personal and Family subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your App Store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. You can manage your subscriptions in your App Store account settings.

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided using this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft's EULA for Terms of Service for Microsoft 365. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-gb&aid=SoftwareLicensingTerms_en-gb.htm

Microsoft Edge: AI browser.description:
Microsoft Edge is your AI-powered browser with Copilot built in — your personal AI assistant for smarter, more productive browsing. Powered by the latest AI models from OpenAI and Microsoft, Copilot helps you ask questions, refine searches, summarize content, write effortlessly, and create images with DALL·E 3. Talk to Copilot with your voice to brainstorm ideas, tackle complex questions, or even write stories and scripts — hands-free. Get real-time answers, support, and creative inspiration — all in one place. With AI deeply integrated into Edge through Copilot, you can browse, create, and get things done — anywhere, anytime.
 
Enhance your browsing experience with extensions. You can now personalize your experience in Edge with extensions such as cookie management, speed control for videos and audios, and website theme customization.
 
Browse the web securely and prioritize your privacy with smart security tools, such as tracking prevention, Microsoft Defender SmartScreen, AdBlock, InPrivate browsing and InPrivate search. Safeguard your browsing history for a more secure and private online experience.
 
MICROSOFT EDGE FEATURES:
🔍 A SMARTER WAY TO FIND
• Supercharge your searches with Copilot, the AI assistant built into Microsoft Edge, delivering faster, more accurate, and personalized results.
• Explore visually with Copilot — upload images to search, get insights, or spark inspiration with AI lens.
• Use AI-powered Copilot to instantly summarize web pages, PDFs, and videos — providing clear, cited insights in seconds.
• All powered by the most advanced AI models from OpenAI and Microsoft, enabling smarter information discovery like never before.
 
💡 A SMARTER WAY TO DO
• Talk to Copilot with your voice to brainstorm ideas, tackle complex questions, or even write stories and scripts — hands-free.
• Compose with Copilot — your built-in AI writer that transforms ideas into polished drafts. With AI and Copilot, creating content is faster, easier, and more intelligent than ever.
• Translate or proofread across multiple languages with AI, making your writing globally ready.
• Generate images with Copilot and DALL·E 3 — just describe what you want, and our AI brings it to life.
• Tailor your experience with powerful extensions that redefine how you browse.
• Listen to content while performing other tasks or improve your reading comprehension with Read Aloud, in your desired language. Available in a variety of natural-sounding voices and accents.
 
🔒 A SMARTER WAY TO STAY SAFE
• Browse securely with InPrivate browsing that safeguards sensitive information from trackers.
• Enhanced privacy protection in InPrivate mode, with no search history saved to Microsoft Bing or associated with your Microsoft account.
• Password monitoring alerts you if any credentials saved in your browser are found on the dark web.
• Default tracking prevention for a more private browsing experience.
• Ad Blocker – use AdBlock Plus to block unwanted ads, enhance focus and remove distracting content.
• Stay protected while you browse by blocking phishing and malware attacks with Microsoft Defender SmartScreen.

Download Microsoft Edge — the AI browser with Copilot built in. Explore smarter ways to search, create, and get things done with the power of AI at your fingertips.

It can also generate social media captions, YouTube video topics, and Quora answers. With features like AI ads writing, grammar correction, translation, and creative writing prompts, AI Writer makes content creation easy and efficient.

If you're looking for a writing tool that can help you produce engaging and unique content with ease, look no further than AI Writer by ChatGPT. Our innovative app harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to give you the tools you need to create high-quality writing, no matter your skill level.

With AI Writer, you can generate ideas and brainstorm new topics, all while benefiting from advanced natural language processing algorithms that analyze your writing style and suggest improvements. Whether you're writing fiction, non-fiction, or blog posts, our app provides a range of writing prompts and templates to help you get started.

In addition to its writing assistance features, AI Writer also includes  sentence restructuring, and keyword suggestions to ensure your content is polished and optimized for search engines. This powerful combination of features saves you time and effort, making it easier than ever to create compelling content that resonates with your audience.

AI Writer by ChatGPT is the perfect tool to take your writing to the next level. Download the app today and start creating your best work yet!

Article writer: Generates unique and high-quality articles on various topics using AI technology.
Email writer: Helps users create professional and effective emails for different purposes, such as business communication, marketing campaigns, and personal correspondence.

AI Essay Writer.description:
AI Essay Writer app by Editpad allows you to generate unique and informative essays quickly in a matter of seconds. You can make different types of essays online in various lengths according to your needs and requirements.

The Essay Generator app has many helpful features that you can use for free without any Signup or paid subscription.

How to Use Editpad AI Essay Writer App?
Here is how you can use our AI essay writer application:
✔ Download the app and launch it
✔ Enter the topic of the essay in the provided space
✔ Select the length of the essay as per your requirements
✔ Select the type of essay you want to have written (Basic, Persuasive, etc.)
✔ Enable the “Add Reference” or “Bypass AI” features if needed
✔ Tap on the “Write My Essay” button to start the essay generation process

Features of our Essay Maker app
Here are some of the main features you can enjoy with our essay maker application:

Multiple Languages Available
The essay generator app offered by Editpad can be used in multiple different languages. It’s not only available in English. Rather, you can choose between languages such as Spanish, Portuguese, French, and so on. To select the language, you have to go to the Settings menu and choose the option from there.

Advanced AI-Driven Generation
Our essay typer application utilizes AI models such as GPT-4 & LLM etc. to create unique, engaging, and informative essays every time you use it. You don’t have to worry about getting plagiarized content in the output.

Multiple Essays Types Available
There are different types of essays that you may want to create depending on your assignment. With our essay typer app, you can choose from options such as Basic, Persuasive, Comparing, Analytical, and Expository. The essay will be written according to the type you select.

Multiple Essay Lengths Available
You can choose the length of the essay before you start the process. You can choose between:
Short: The length of this essay will be around 400 to 500 words.
Medium: The length of this essay will be around 600+ words.
Long: The length of this essay will typically be 700+ words.

Bypass AI and Add References
Our AI essay writer application also provides a “Bypass AI” feature and an “Add References” feature.

With the “Bypass AI” feature, you can make the AI-generated essay look human like. In other words, it will not be detected with AI detection tools and it will look as if it has been written by a human rather than an application.

The “Add References” feature lets you add the reference sources for the information in the generated essay. If you have been asked by your teacher to put references in your essay, you can use this feature.

Download Generated Essay
You can download the essay generated by our application to your device’s local storage by clicking on the download icon at the bottom of the output box. The file will be saved in Word and PDF format.

What are the Benefits of Using Our AI Essay Generator App?
There are a lot of benefits to using our AI essay generator app. 

No plagiarism issues
The essays made by our app are unique, and they don’t have plagiarism issues. There is no repetition in the essays as well. New outputs are provided every time, which means you can use the app as many times as you want.

Quick and easy essay generation
Our essay generator app does not require any signing up or premium purchases. Essays are generated quickly and easily without a lot of hassle.
Note:
Our AI Essay Writer is aimed at providing the right information to improve and streamline users’ writing tasks. The application doesn’t help to write any type of sensitive, adult, harmful or hateful content. However, in case, you find such content generated by our app, immediately inform us via email at support@editpad.org. We’ll add that type of data in our filters to ensure it will not be generated in the future.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.editpad.org/ai-essay-writer/mobile-application/privacy-policy

Rewriting app does not require any registration. Just download and enjoy. How to Use: Ai Rewriter App - Rephrase Sentences App? Our Paraphrase App has an easy-to-use interface. You can use it in a couple of simple steps. 1. First of all, download the app to your mobile device and open it. 2. When the app open, enter the text into the provided space. You can type the text there directly or copy-paste it from a source. 3. Or, you can upload a file from your device’s storage. The text will be automatically imported. 4. Once the process is complete, you can edit the output by clicking on the changed words and selecting alternative synonyms to apply in their place. 6. Multiple Paraphrase Modes You can choose from multiple Paraphraser modes to select how you want the output to be. File Uploads Typing or pasting text can take up too much time. You can quickly upload files from your mobile device to speed up the process. There are three different file formats that are supported by our app. 3. Modify Results If you don’t like the changes that are initially made by our paraphrase app, you can make your own modifications to the output text. For one, - You don’t have to worry about any paid memberships or anything. - Our Paraphrase app utilizes an advanced AI tool. Voice Access.description: Voice Access helps anyone who has difficulty manipulating a touch screen (e.g. due to paralysis, tremor, or temporary injury) use their Android device by voice. Voice Access provides many voice commands for: - Basic navigation (e.g. "go back", "go home", "open Gmail") - Controlling the current screen (e.g. "tap next", "scroll down") - Text editing and dictation (e.g. "type hello", "replace coffee with tea") You can also say "Help" any time to see a short list of commands. Voice Access includes a tutorial which introduces the most common voice commands (starting Voice Access, tapping, scrolling, basic text editing, and getting help). You can use the Google Assistant to start Voice Access by saying "Hey Google, Voice Access". To do this, you’ll need to enable "Hey Google" detection. You can also tap either the Voice Access notification or a blue Voice Access button and start talking. To pause Voice Access temporarily, just say "stop listening". To disable Voice Access completely, go to Settings > Accessibility > Voice Access and turn off the switch. For additional support, see Voice Access help. This app uses the AccessibilityService API to help users with motor impairments. It uses the API to collect information about the controls on the screen and activate them based on the user’s spoken instructions.

AI Art Generator: AI Picture.description:
AI Art Generator uses artificial intelligence to create unique and beautiful works of art, inspired by your own creativity. With just a few taps, you can turn your thoughts into reality, creating stunning, ready to use images and make your life easier.

How does it work?
The AI Art Generator uses a process called text-to-image generation to create art from your text prompts. Simply type in what you want to create, and the AI will generate a unique image that matches your description. You can use this app to create anything from abstract paintings to realistic portraits, and even to generate your own custom emojis.
Not only can you use text prompts, you can also use picture like art prompts to create your own ai art. Upload photo, choose art style and authorize AI generated art for you.

There are many benefits using AI Art Generator, including:
* Creativity: The AI Art Generator helps you to be more creative, by providing you with inspiration and new ideas.
* Expressiveness: Express yourself more effectively, by allowing you to create images that represent your thoughts and feelings.
* Personalization: Create personalized images, such as gifts for friends and family, or custom artwork for your home.

How to use the AI generated art?
Using the AI Art Generator is simple. Just follow these steps:
1. Open the app and input text prompts or upload your photo.
2. Select a theme from the "Theme" menu.
3. Tap the "Generate" button to create your image.
4. Save and share your AI art

The AI generated art is still under development, and there are some limitations to what it can do. However, the AI Art Generator is constantly improving, new features are being added all the time and it has a limitless potential for development. We value your input since your feedback can help us to enhance our app to better improve the user experience.

Try the AI Art Generator today and see what amazing things you can create!

Whether you want to see yourself as a superhero, on a tropical beach, in historical eras, or with completely customized scenarios, our advanced AI makes it possible with just a few taps.

CREATE YOUR PERSONAL AI MODEL
Upload a few selfies to create your personalized AI model. The app works for both men and women, with specialized categories tailored to each. Your photos are processed securely, and you maintain full control of your content.

EXPLORE DIVERSE CATEGORIES
Transform your appearance with our extensive collection of categories:
• Professional business portraits
• Beach and vacation scenes
• Wedding and formal attire
• Superhero transformations
• Historical eras like the 60s
• Fitness and athletic styles
• Holiday themes
• And many more!

CUSTOM PROMPTS
Premium users can create completely custom scenarios with our text prompt feature. Describe any scene or style you can imagine, and watch as the AI brings your vision to life with your likeness.

HIGH-DEFINITION RESULTS
Generate stunning, high-quality portraits that look professional and realistic. Premium subscribers enjoy higher resolution images without watermarks.

EASY SHARING
Save your favorite creations to your device or share them directly to social media and messaging apps with just a tap.

GALLERY MANAGEMENT
Browse, organize, and manage all your AI-generated portraits in the built-in gallery. Filter by AI model to quickly find the images you're looking for.

PRIVACY FOCUSED
We take your privacy seriously. Your uploaded photos are processed securely, and you maintain full control over your content. The app complies with privacy regulations and provides clear terms of use.

SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS
• Weekly subscription gives you access to all premium features including custom prompts, all categories, watermark-free images, and high-definition output
• One-time credit purchases available for occasional users
• Free tier with limited features to get started
Transform your selfies into amazing AI art with Selfie AI today. Download now and discover the countless creative possibilities!

AI Picasso - Dream Art Studio.description:
Powerful AI for Video Generation
Animate your favorite photos into videos with the most powerful video-generating AI! This app leverages cutting-edge video generation AI to enable the creation of a variety of videos. With the AI Video feature, uploading just one image can bring to life the people or characters in that image, making them dance. It's also possible to train the AI with faces of you or your friends to create videos that depict the transition from childhood to adulthood, or even to try on various outfits from different eras or countries.

Using AI Video
To use AI Video, simply launch the app, navigate to the AI Video tab, and select your preferred style. Then, follow the app's instructions to upload images and generate AI videos.

AI Avatar Creation
The app also offers an AI Avatar feature, which is user-friendly and straightforward. You only need to select and upload 10-20 of your photos. Your personal AI will craft an enhanced avatar, offering a new version of yourself unlike anything you've seen before. This might give you inspiration for new makeup looks or how to use filters differently.

Using AI Avatar
Using AI Avatar is a breeze. Just launch the app, go to the AI Avatar tab, start the process, and upload 10-20 photos. After that, all you need to do is wait for the AI to process and generate the photos. The app also allows for cropping and editing within its interface, making it easy to create numerous personalized AI avatars.

AI Image Generation Features
The AI image generation feature of this app allows for the easy creation of images just by entering a desired picture in text form and pressing the generate button. Users can specify styles and reference images to create pictures in their preferred style. The app can even generate unique 'Irasutoya' style images, a speciality of this AI Picasso app. In addition to that, there are options to generate images in various styles such as fantasy, charcoal, 3D games, cyberpunk, synth, and oil painting. The images created can also be used as original wallpapers.

Using AI Image Generation
The process to use AI Image Generation is straightforward. Launch the app, select the 'Generate from Text' option, enter the desired text, then select a style and tap the generate button. With these simple steps, users can explore the vast possibilities of AI-generated imagery.

Hypic - Photo Editor & AI Art.description:
Hypic is an All-in-One Photo Editing Tool with Professional smart Features.
Hypic offers a suite of professional image editing tools, including one-click magic removal and cutout, photo quality enhancement, AI portrait beautification, and a range of trendy effects, filters, and templates.
As a photo editor, Hypic integrates the latest fashion trends from TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest, Capcut to meet your diverse needs. It helps you effortlessly edit your pics and create works of art, ensuring your photos stand out in social media. 

Features:
Full-featured photo editor
- AI Cleanup: Erase photo backgrounds in just one click. With AI, smoothly removes any unwanted objects in the image. 
- AI photo quality enhancement : Let AI effortlessly enhance photo quality, making your photos clearer. 
- AI Cutout: Remove photo background by automatically recognizing objects and allowing precise adjustments.
- Batch Edit: Edit multiple photos in the same style to save editing time. Share them to TikTok with just one click.
- Collage & Overlay: Explore a variety of collage styles to add artistic flair to your photos. Overlay images through blending modes to unlock endless creativity. 
- Video thumbnail editing: Use AI expand and professional templates to empower your CapCut viral video editing by creating alluring thumbnails. 
- Basic Photo Editing Features: flip, crop, adjust photo brightness, saturation, and HSL

Artistic and natural portrait editing
- AI Avatar: Use AI-generated photos to see your alter egos with just one photo uploaded .
- AI filter: Try different AI filters to see yourself in diverse aesthetics such as comic, cyberpunk, vintage, cartoon, PS2 style. You can also get personalized AI headshots for your pets.
- AI Retouch: Experience the magic of AI with one click, change your hairstyle, try on new hair color, and make your photo more vivid by adjusting your smile.
- Makeup: Apply the most suitable makeup for you in just one tap. 
- Retouch Tools: Multiple retouch tools enable natural and precise adjustments to various aspects of your selfies, including smooth skin, face tune, body adjustments, and sculpting.

Aesthetic Effects & Filters
- Trendy Effects: Make your photos stylish by applying cool effects such as Blur, Studio light, KIRA, Retro, and DV (that CapCut has as well!) 
  - Add a radiant glow to your photos with Long Exposure Effects. 
  - Use Lofi Effects to capture a vintage Vibe in your photos.
- Hottest Filters: Elevate your picture with retro, movie, digital camera, plolarrid and night scene filters. 
- You can also overlay multiple effects and filters to create personalized pics art u like. 

Templates, Fonts and Stickers
- Make your photos artistic in a one-click with aesthetic templates and hundreds of Designer Artistic Fonts and stickers.
- Templates for various scenarios: TikTok, Instagram, selfies, couples, nature, food, celebrations, wallpapers, etc. Stay Up-to-Date with the latest image and short video trends, CapCut trends, Memes, etc.

Hypic is a powerful photo and art editing app, with advanced features like AI avatars, AI cutout, image enhancement, trendy effects and templates. Use Hypic to edit your selfies and still photos into aesthetic pics of art and boost your social media on TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest, and Facebook! 

Any questions about Hypic (Pics editor & AI art) Please contact us at retouchpics.support@bytedance.com.

• Answer questions, write content, deep research, generate images & video, analyze files, code and more.
• 25+ premium AI models from OpenAI, DeepSeek, Anthropic, Google, FLUX, Mistral, and more
• Apps for every device, including web, mobile and desktop
• Industry-leading prices with unlimited plans starting at $5/month. Try for free, cancel anytime.

Ninja AI is the all-in-one AI Assistant that saves you time and money. Unlike basic AI chatbots, Ninja is a compound AI system, powered by 25+ leading AI models and a team of specialized AI agents to help you quickly complete everyday tasks. 

AI Researcher 
• From real-time search to deep research, ask AI to generate answers to any question quickly

AI Writer
• Ask AI to generate social media content, blog posts, articles, and more with ease

AI Image Generator
• Ask AI to create anything from stunning art to realistic photos using the best AI image models and custom settings for any project

AI Image Editor
• No photoshop skills required, ask AI to edit any image to your specifications. Add/remove text and other elements, change colors, and more.

AI Video Generator
• Ask AI to generate stunning videos for any project with Amazon Nova Reel

AI Podcast Podcasts
• Turn your prompt results into high-quality podcasts with a single click. Create content in a format that's easy to consume on the go.

AI File Analyzer
• Upload and ask AI to analyze complex files quickly. From reports to legal documents, get answers to any question with ease.

AI Code Generator
• Ask AI to create and debug code in any programming language

Meeting Scheduler
• Automate meeting scheduling, simply connect your Gmail account and ask AI to book meetings on your behalf

Editor
• A workspace to seamlessly create, refine, and manage any writing or coding project

Compare Mode
• Compare results from any two LLMs side-by-side

Say goodbye to app switching — Ninja is a superset of ChatGPT, DeepSeek, Claude & Gemini, giving you access to 25+ leading AI models, under one subscription.

Available AI Models Include:

• OpenAI: GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 Mini, DALL-E 3
• DeepSeek R1 & DeepSeek V3
• Anthropic: Claude 3.7 Sonnet & Haiku
• Google: Gemini 2.5 Pro (Preview) & Flash
• Amazon Bedrock: Amazon Nova, Pro, Lite, Micro, Canvas & Reel
• Meta: Llama 4 Scout and Llama 4 Maverick
• FLUX Pro & Schnell
• Mistral Large & Small
• Stable Diffusion XL 1.0
Plus more!

Thanks to our partnership with AWS, we're able to offer unlimited tasks starting from as low as $5/month.

Leave basic chatbots behind and join the future of generative AI with Ninja's all-in-one AI Assistant.

Ninja Subscription Plans:

• Basic (Free) - Up to 6 tasks per day on our free plan
• Standard ($5/Month) - Enjoy unlimited tasks with Ninja’s AI models
• Pro: ($10/Month) - Unlimited tasks and access to 8 AI models (OpenAI, Anthropic, and more)
• Ultra: ($15/Month) - Unlimited tasks, advanced features, and access 25+ premium AI models

For More Information: https://www.ninjatech.ai/
Ninja Web App: https://myninja.ai/
Terms of Use: https://www.ninjatech.ai/terms-of-service

Created by NinjaTech AI

AI Chatbot - Super Chat.description:
Super Chat: Your Ultimate AI-Powered Assistant

Elevate your mobile experience with Super Chat, the most versatile and intelligent chatbot at your fingertips. Get ready to unlock a world of knowledge, productivity, and convenience, all within a single app.

Key Features:

1. Knowledge at Your Fingertips
SuperChat is your all-knowing companion. Ask it anything, from general knowledge queries to personalized assistance, and receive accurate and insightful answers instantly.

2. Document Summarization
Say goodbye to information overload! SuperChat can summarize lengthy PDF documents, making them easy to digest. Quickly grasp the essence of any document without the need for time-consuming reading.

3. Web Summarization
Don't have time to read lengthy articles? SuperChat can provide concise and meaningful summaries of web content, allowing you to stay informed on the go.

4. OCR (Optical Character Recognition)
SuperChat transforms your device into a powerful scanner. Scan printed text from images or documents, and watch as SuperChat converts it into editable text, making it a breeze to work with.

5. Image Generation
Unleash your creativity with SuperChat's image generation capabilities. Craft stunning visuals, infographics, or memes with ease, all from within the app.

6. Audio Transcription
Never miss a word again. SuperChat can transcribe audio recordings into text, making it ideal for meetings, lectures, and interviews. Easily search, edit, and share transcriptions as needed.

7. Pre-Made Prompts
SuperChat offers a rich library of pre-made prompts, covering a wide array of topics. Whether you're looking for conversation starters, jokes, or helpful suggestions, SuperChat has you covered.

Why SuperChat?

Unmatched Versatility: SuperChat is your one-stop solution for a wide range of tasks, from answering questions to document handling, content generation, and pre-made prompts.
AI-Powered Precision: Our advanced AI technology ensures accurate and insightful responses, regardless of the complexity of your query.
Time Saver: SuperChat streamlines tasks that would otherwise be time-consuming, allowing you to focus on what truly matters.
Enhanced Productivity: From summarizing documents to generating images and accessing pre-made prompts, SuperChat empowers you to achieve more in less time.
Seamless Integration: Use SuperChat in your daily routine and make it your indispensable companion.
Say hello to the future of AI-powered convenience. Download SuperChat now and experience the ultimate chatbot with a multitude of capabilities, including a treasure trove of pre-made prompts. Supercharge your productivity and knowledge today!
